TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ImageMapEventHandler(object sender, ImageMapEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ImageMapEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ImageMapEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ImageMapEventArgs)
public delegate void ImageMapEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ImageMapEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的型別 引數。

span.span: The argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event. 控制項包含兩個物件。The control contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，因而導致頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個物件。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the objects. 事件由處理`VoteMap_Clicked`事件處理常式。The event is handled by the `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性和路徑至映像適當地更新，讓應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]
